Package redecker.mickey.webcnc.restcontroller

package redecker.mickey.webcnc.restcontroller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddSwitchController
    This class provides an API call to add new switches from the frontend
    GetSwitchesController
    This class provides an API call to fetch all switch information from the backend to the frontend
    ReloadBackendController
    This class provides an API call to reload the backend from the frontend
    RemoveSwitchController
    This class provides an API call to remove a switch permanently from the backend
    SavePortController
    This class provides an API call to save a new TSN configuration for a port and apply it on the switch
    ValidatePasswordController
    This class provides an API call to validate the password of the WebCNC
